stimulusHtml:
An object moves along a straight line with a velocity \(v\) given as a function of time \(t\) by the equation \(v\left(t\right)=\alpha t^2\ +\ \beta t+\ \gamma\).

Which of the following expressions represents \(\Delta x\left(t\right)\), the displacement of the object as a function of time \(t\) starting at a time \(t=0\)?
